title: AMD RX6800XT
subtitle: The Radeon RX 6800 XT is a high-end graphics card by AMD, launched on October 28th, 2020.
detail:
Compute Units 72 
 Boost Frequence Up to 2250 MHz 
Game Frequence 2015 MHz 
 Ray Accelerators 72 
 Peak Pixel Fill-Rate Up to 288 GP/s 
 Peak Texture Fill-Rate Up to 648 GT/s

title: NVIDIA RTX 4090
subtitle: The GeForce RTX 4090 is an enthusiast-class graphics card by NVIDIA, launched on September 20th, 2022.
detail: The Ada architecture unleashes the full glory of ray tracing, which simulates how light behaves in the real world. With the power of RTX 40 Series and third-gen RT Cores, you can experience incredibly detailed virtual worlds like never before.

title: INTEL ARC A770
subtitle: The Arc A770 is a performance-segment graphics card by Intel, launched on October 12th, 2022.
detail: Built on the 6 nm process, and based on the DG2-512 graphics processor, in its ACM-G10 variant, the card supports DirectX 12 Ultimate. This ensures that all modern games will run on Arc A770.
